data.comment: The big names in today's match at Bosuilstadion have now been confirmed.
Antwerp kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 5, Rocky Bushiri scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 1-0 at Bosuilstadion.
Great finish from Koji Miyoshi to give Antwerp a 2-0 lead.
It's now 3-0 in Antwerp as Dieumerci Mbokani scores for Antwerp.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Bosuilstadion.
The second half is underway in Antwerp - Mechelen with the kick-off.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a first substitution, with Nikola Storm replacing Gustav Engvall.
In the minute 56, Mechelen make their second substitution with William Togui replacing Igor De Camargo.
Martin Hongla is booked for the home team.
Rocky Bushiri (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 62, Jules Van Cleemput is on a sub for Issa Kabore for Mechelen.
The home team have replaced Dieumerci Mbokani with Bruny Nsimba. This is the first substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
Geoffry Hairemans strikes to reduce the deficit to 3-1 at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 75, Birger Verstraete is replacing Lior Refaelov for the home team.
Lucas Bijker (Mechelen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Antwerp take a comfortable 4-1 lead thanks to Abdoulaye Seck.
In the minute 79, Ivan Leko is making the team's third substitution at Bosuilstadion with Nill De Pauw replacing Didier Lamkel Ze.
Nicolas Laforge blows to end the match. The final score is 4-1.
